title.native: マーメイドメロディーぴちぴちピッチピュア
title.romaji: Mermaid Melody: Pichi Pichi Pitch Pure

description:
After the final battle against Gaito, Sara had given her life to remain with him. The sea world is now at peace, but only with six mermaid princesses.

While Caren, Noel, and Coco have returned to their kingdoms, it should be time for Lucia, Hanon, and Rina to do the same. After all, Mitsuki Tarou is leaving for Germany, and Doumoto Kaito is heading to Hawaii. Lucia is devestated, and when things couldn't get any worse, Kaito is lost at sea! Worst of all, a strange angel named Michel has appeared, wanting the mermaids to join him. But on the lighter side, Sara's spirit tells Lucia of Sara's successor, a young mermaid named Seira. The mermaids are in for another adventure!

tags.name: Mermaid
tags.description: A mythological creature with the body of a human and the tail of a fish.

tags.description: Prominently features a character who generally retains a cold, blunt and cynical exterior, but once one gets to know them, they have a very warm and loving interior.

tags.description: The act or an instance of taking or attempting to take one's own life voluntarily and intentionally.

tags.name: Denpa
tags.description: Works that feature themes of social dissociation, delusions, and other issues like suicide, bullying, self-isolation, paranoia, and technological necessity in daily lives. Classic iconography: telephone poles, rooftops, and trains.

tags.description: Centers around tragic events and unhappy endings.

tags.description: Prominently features a character(s) with memory loss.

__Height:__ 157 cm (5'2")

[Website](https://erikitamura.com/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/KITAxERI) | [King Records](http://king-cr.jp/artist/kitaeri/)

A Japanese voice actress and singer. She used to be a child actress by the name of Eri Okamura. 

She is primarily known for her role in Blood+ as Saya Otonashi and singing "Tsuyogari," the third ending for the anime series Konjiki No Gash Bell!! She is also known to be an amateur manga artist in Japan in her spare time. Kitamura is affiliated with talent agency Early Wing and was formerly affiliated with Kaleidoscope.

Currently works in the music unit ARTERY VEIN with Asami Imai. Also provides the voice of CUL, a Vocaloid.

Hobbies: listening to music, shopping  
Skills & Abilities: painting, piano
**Michiko Yokote** is a Japanese scriptwriter. She is the pupil of [Kazunori Itou](https://anilist.co/staff/97941).

Hanamori entered Nakayoshi's New Faces contest in 2000 with her manga MISS DIETER HEROINE. Her debut work 'Get Nude!' was in 2001's Nakayoshi Spring Breakland. Pichi Pichi Pitch is considered her signature work.

She is the youngest of 3 children and loves furry animals and dogs. She is a fan of Johnny's and Variety shows. She likes snacks and loves to sleep. She is a very energetic persona and loves to talk.
Known to be a fast and efficient worker. Often directing multiple works at a time.
